properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 v3 v4 c1 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let our praise be Your welcome
Let our songs be a sign
We are here for You, we are here for You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let Your breath come from heaven
Fill our hearts with Your life
We are here for You, we are here for You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
CHORUS To You our hearts are open
Nothing here is hidden
You are our one desire
You alone are holy
Only You are worthy
God, let Your fire fall down

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let our shout be Your anthem
Your renown fill the skies
We are here for You, we are here for You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Let Your Word move in power
Let what's dead come to life
We are here for You, we are here for You

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
We welcome You with praise
We welcome You with praise
Almighty God of love
Be welcomed in this place
(repeat)

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Let every heart adore
Let every soul awake
Almighty God of love
Be welcomed in this place

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
We welcome You with praise
We welcome You with praise
Almighty God of love
Be welcomed in this place

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Be welcome in Your house, Lord
Be welcome in Your house
